channel.title: How do u get an admin sign next to your name?
channel.description: how do u get admin sign next to ur name? my p rights are 4 so im owner, but when i type the admin sign aint there

item.title: How do u get an admin sign next to your name?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

player = 0
player mod = 1
Admin = 2
Owner = 3

some information if it would help

Read full topic

player rights have to be 3… not 4.

item.title: How do u get an admin sign next to your name?
item.dc:creator: @getsome getsome
item.description:
@getsome wrote:

[quote=“wales 00, post:5, topic:119059”]actually there is a level 4 rights… but dont work on new sources… just use 3 thats owner but… if 3 dont give u crown… use level 2… that wroks i know that much lol[/quote]u people are fucking idiots,and i really mean all!!!

playerights is an int wich means there is playerights = 21000000 and below the client only tells that 3 = owner and 2 = admin…u people dont even understand the basics of an INT jet u call yourself JAVA coders.

item.title: How do u get an admin sign next to your name?
item.dc:creator: @_Mod_Dude |Mod Dude|
item.description:
@_Mod_Dude wrote:

add this?

if (playerRights == 4) {
out.write(2); //Crown fixup
} else {
out.write(playerRights); // mod level
}

after



			if(playerId == -1) out.write(7);		// "This world is full."
			else out.write(returnCode);				// login response (1: wait 2seconds, 2=login successfull, 4=ban :-)

hope this helps.

item.title: How do u get an admin sign next to your name?
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Whip Mod Whip
item.description:
@Mod_Whip wrote:

Open your player’s file in the folder “Characters” then change player rights to 3, compile, run, enjoy
